#labels fpdusage,0.1.1
= Hou to use FPD 0.1.1 beta =

1) *Account* name is *mandatory* and must be a real Flickr Account one.

FROM and TO page are NOT mandatory, in this case will be downloaded page
FROM 1 to LAST ONE.


WARNING

1. if you have a proxy and you digit wrong parameters FPD will loop and you must close it through Task Manager.

2. during download you cannot close app except with Task Manager
(download process for many pages and 'Large Size' choice could be long, so be patient and wait, otherwise.....Task Manager and kill the process
